name: CGPDFBox
desc: Box types for a PDF page.

items.name: case mediaBox
items.desc: The page media box—a rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that defines the boundaries of the physical medium on which the page is intended to be displayed or printed

items.name: case cropBox
items.desc: The page crop box—a rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that defines the visible region of default user space. When the page is displayed or printed, its contents are to be clipped to this rectangle.

items.name: case bleedBox
items.desc: The page bleed box—a rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that defines the region to which the contents of the page should be clipped when output in a production environment.

items.name: case trimBox
items.desc: The page trim box—a rectangle, expressed in default user space units, that defines the intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming.

items.name: case artBox
items.desc: The page art box—a rectangle, expressed in default user space units, defining the extent of the page’s meaningful content (including potential white space) as intended by the page’s creator.
